name: wolfie's mitts
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
inspired by the movie amadeus, these are ***wolfieâ€™s mitts.***                   

that unforgettable, iconic, infectious laugh. 
wolfie was ever joyful, elegant, flamboyant, over-the-top, and glamorous as all get out. these mitts are reminiscent of beautiful velvet and brocade coats with ruffled edges of sleeves peeking out from beneath. 

wolfie's mitts are sized for tiny, smallish, and larger hands using heavier yarn and larger needles.
for each of the three sizes, a lighter weight yarn is recommended for the ruffle.
instructions are also included for a shorter gauntlet.

the lace pattern is rhythmic, intuitive, easy to memorize, and is both written and charted. 
the pattern is written for magic loop but can easily be adapted for dpns. 

wolfie's mitts have been test knit.
